channel.title: Sections on Instablog
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Instablog

item.title: Design Concept
item.description: This is a brief design sketch of Instablog’s services and components. [](static/uml/designconcept.png) instacrawler: collect URLs from Instagram’s profile instapost: download a single Instagram post’s data blogpost: create a blogpost from all Instagram posts of a single day

item.title: About
item.description: In August 2019, the team DramaLamas will take part in the charity rallye BALKAN EXPRESS RALLY. We want to document our trip using Instagram as well as on our blog. Important websites Team website DramaLamas: dramalamas.tours Team’s Instagram profile: dramalamas.tours2019

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: This section concludes the project. Summary The list below displays the achieved objectives: … … Conclusion Instablog autonomously monitors our Instagram profile for new posts and creates a blog post containing on instagram post from a single day.

item.title: Project Definition
item.description: Existing solutions sharing instagram posts within a blog explicitly embedd an post URL. This is a manual effort one has to do for every new instagram post entry. The Instagram JavaScript plugin, Instafeed.js, utilizes Instagram’s API and retrieves new posts filtered by a user-defined function. As a result, a single blog post embedding this javascript would display a large list of Instagram post. However, it is unclear how a daily blog is generated which only contains the posts from that day.
